title: Dining Out with the Ice Giants
description: Two journalists in an alternate future London meet the people from the outer planets - during one of the worst winters for cold and flooding that London has suffered. From political misdeeds to mushroom picking in a disused Tube station, Donal and Myron uncover all sorts of activities... and dangers. SAVED FROM LONDON’S FLOOD Donal, an Irish journalist, and Myron, his Cockney-Jamaican colleague, are feature writers with zine London’s Eye. They tend to attract trouble. FLU VACCINES NEARLY GONE Since they have many friends from other planets, they also enjoy good meals in ethnic restaurants. BOND STAR MISTRI DIES This winter, a whole lot of problems are facing London, and who better to cover them? BANK PAYMENTS HACKED The lads might even make new friends in the process of gaining a scoop. Or new enemies. DRUG COMPANY SCANDAL
author: Clare O'Beara
